member.name: T:Dell.Adept.Core.ITestable
member.summary: The ITestable Interface is used to identify the object under test, its name, and its owner.

member.name: P:Dell.Adept.Core.ITestable.TestablePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path for the object that is to be tested. URI for a web page;
member.value: The path to the testable object.

member.name: T:Dell.Adept.Core.IValidatable
member.summary: The IValidatable Interface allows you to create universal validation code that will work on any type implementing the interface.

member.name: M:Dell.Adept.Core.IValidatable.Validate
member.summary: Validates this instance. Validity is determined by the owner of the object.
member.returns: true if the object is valid, false otherwise.

member.name: T:Dell.Adept.Core.Testing.MsTestBase
member.summary: The MsTestBase class that will be the base type for all Adept tests based on the MSTest2 standard.

member.name: P:Dell.Adept.Core.Testing.MsTestBase.TestContext
member.summary: Gets or sets the test context which provides information about and functionality for the current test run.

member.name: T:Dell.Adept.Core.Testing.TestBase
member.summary: The TestBase class is the root type for all Adept test classes. It is currently reserved for future use in order to support multiple test frameworks and test types.
